Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: location
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: The location permission allows the device’s positoin to be tracked

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: locationAlways
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: The locationAlways permission provides location data even if app is in background

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: photo
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: Used to access the user’s photo library

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: microphone
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: Permission allows developers to interact with the device microphone

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: camera
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: Permission that allows developers to interact with on-device camera

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: notification
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: The notification permission allows the iOS system to receive notification from app

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: calendar
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: Permission that allows app to read & write to device calendar

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: bluetooth
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: Permission that allows app to access device’s bluetooth technologies

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: contacts
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: A permission that allows developers to read & write to device contacts

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: motion
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: Permission that give app access to motion and fitness related sensor data

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: reminders
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: The reminders permission is needed to interact with device reminders

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: speech
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: Permission that allows app to use speech recognition

Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.name: tracking
Enums/PermissionModel.html#/s:18Permissi.abstract: In order for app to track user’s data across apps and websites, the tracking permission is needed

Enums/PermissionModel.html.name: PermissionModel
Enums/PermissionModel.html.abstract: The types of iOS system permission for show in the JMPermissions view
